question: Which country houses the second most powerful waterfall in Europe "Dettifoss Waterfall"?
explanation: Iceland houses the second most powerful waterfall in Europe "Dettifoss Waterfall". Dettifoss is a waterfall in Vatnajokull National Park in Northeast Iceland and is reputed to be the second most powerful waterfall in Europe after the Rhine Falls. Dettifoss is situated on the Jokulsa a Fjollum river, which flows from the Vatnajokull glacier and collects water from a large area in Northeast Iceland. It is the second-largest waterfall in Iceland in terms of volume discharge
